about_the_game:
Welcome to the official Texas Hold’em Poker Game of MONOPOLY. Are you ready to conquer the Poker empire ?

MONOPOLY Poker is a Play-For-Fun Poker game that is intended for amusement only.
All in-game sales are final. The games are intended for an adult audience (i.e. intended for use by those 21 or older). The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling.

MONOPOLY POKER FEATURES️:

MASTER TEXAS HOLDEM POKER - There are three types of Texas Holdem you can play including: Cash Games, Sit & Go Tournaments, and super fast Spin & Play Rounds.

FREE CHIPS EVERY 4 HOURS - Receive a free stack of poker chips several times a day so you can play for even longer!

DOMINATE THE LEAGUES - Beat the other players and prove that you’re a true card shark when it comes to Texas Holdem poker.

WIN THE RINGS & FEEL THE GLORY - Earn as many of the Champions Rings as you can in the Sit & Go Tournaments.

CLIMB THE LEADERBOARD - Only the best players will reach the highest spots!

HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS - Enjoy top notch graphics and animations.

WIN TOURNAMENTS AROUND THE WORLD - Show off your Poker skills from São Paulo to Las Vegas.

HIGHER STAKES, BIGGER PAYOUTS - The payouts will get bigger and better as you participate in more and more multiplayer tournaments.

SPIN & PLAY - Press your luck and find out if you can win a huge jackpot in this version of Texas Holdem.

PLAY ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME - You can enjoy this online poker game whenever and wherever you are with your phone or tablet.

PLAYING FAIR - This is a Texas Holdem PvP game that plays by the rules to keep things fair.

MR MONOPOLY shuffles the cards while using the best proven methods. You won’t find any roulette or bingo style poker here!
All the thrills of Las Vegas can be found at each one of the Texas Holdem tables that are waiting for you in this challenging free online poker game.

WIN BIG BUCKS

Play your cards right during each round and earn the Jackpot. Just like in a Texas Holdem tournament in a real casino, you’ll need to strategically raise the stakes and know when it’s time to fold. Use your poker skills after MR MONOPOLY passes out the cards and carefully consider how many chips you’re willing to risk during each exciting round.

This Texas Holdem card game, which is one of the world’s best multiplayer card games, does not feature real money or real gambling.

THREE AWESOME VERSIONS OF TEXAS HOLDEM

Show off your skills during your attempts to earn the Champions Rings in the Sit & Go Tournaments and make it to the top of the leaderboard. The more chips you win, the higher you’ll rise in the rankings. The competition will get more intense, though. You can even play with your friends in this addictive and free multiplayer poker game. Find out if you can collect all of their chips while you use your favorite bet strategy. Download the game today, and get ready for all sorts of cool and challenging poker excitement!
Do you want to join poker tournaments and become a master of poker? Download MONOPOLY Poker now and start playing today for free! The classic Texas Hold’em card game, now for mobile and tablets!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the game board, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2024 Hasbro. All rights reserved.

MONOPOLY Poker does not require payment to download and play. It also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items.
